message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this incredible product to you. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. As we start our negotiation, I'm willing to offer you the product for $950000. This is a great starting point, and I'm open to discussing further to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. Can you meet me at this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're interested in the product, but I'm afraid $850000 is a bit too low for me. Considering the product's value and your interest, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm proposing a counteroffer of $900000. This is a fair price that still gives you a good deal, and I believe it's worth considering.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $875000. Can you consider this price?

I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. Considering the value of the product and your interest, I'm proposing a counteroffer of $890000. This is as low as I can go, and I believe it's still a fair price for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $875000 is a bit too high, I'm willing to meet you at $885000. Can you consider this price?

I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. Considering the value of the product and your interest, I'm proposing a counteroffer of $890000. This is the lowest I can go, and I believe it's still a fair price for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm starting to think that I might be better off going with another seller. I'm willing to meet you at $882500. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're getting close to walking away, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I'm getting very close to my minimum acceptable price. Considering the value of the product and your interest, I'm proposing a counteroffer of $890000. This is the lowest I can go, and I believe it's still a fair price for both of us.
